en.title: FusionExcel Making Waves at Waisak Fair, Medan, Indonesia.
en.content:
REPORT BY PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR RICKY LIM.

FusionExcel participated in an expo in conjunction with the celebration of Waisak Fair 05th - 10th May 2009 at the Atrium Sun Plaza, Medan, Indonesia. 

The FE team was lead by Presidential Director Ricky Lim, Executive Director Alfred Lim and Director Rusli. The expo was a huge success. The crowd was very receptive and amazed with our demos. Many customers felt the effectiveness of FusionExcel's Quantum Science products and they came back to our stand to purchase more for their family members. 

We received from a few customers their personal appreciations and heart-felt thanks for introducing FE's amazing Quantum Science products that helped them improve their health. They voluntarily shared their testimonies with the crowd and urged new customers to purchase FusionExcel's Quantum Science products.
